name: saladereuniaobelz
description: Sistema de Agendamento de Sala de ReuniÃ£o - Belz Corretora de Seguros

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && node index.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Starting Vercel build...' && cd frontend && npm ci --silent --production=false && npm run build
